text: <@UDFRYRTBL> According to the 2021 Root work plan, they plan to make Minut2 the default minimizer (replacing TMinuit).

elements.text: According to the 2021 Root work plan, they plan to make Minut2 the default minimizer (replacing TMinuit).

text: Oh wow! Replacing Fortran with C++? Are they sure they are ready for that step? It's only been around for 15 years or so... I mean, what if it's slower? Or if there are bugs...

elements.text: Oh wow! Replacing Fortran with C++? Are they sure they are ready for that step? It's only been around for 15 years or so... I mean, what if it's slower? Or if there are bugs...

text: Anyway, thanks for the update. Good to know we're not behind. Just need to register Minuit2

elements.text: Anyway, thanks for the update. Good to know we're not behind. Just need to register Minuit2
